title: For my JYP audition, I’m going to audition as a vocalist. Where should I do my audition? Also, what song should I try? - Quora

response.answer_text: Background- Your audition should be somewhere, where there is not a lot of noise and people so like a studio or your room there just can’t be so much stuff in the back of you. Song- Try yo find a song that matches with your voice and the rhythm. So lets say you can do a high note try to find a song that has a high note in it and try it or try another song that has a lot or a few high notes try that song. Now lets say you can’t really do high note , try to find a song that does not have a high note Now lets say you can do both, try to find a song that has both and that one should be pretty easy there are a lot of songs that has both.
Do your audition in a quiet environment, only your voice needs to be heard. And no JYP songs, they’ll compare you in a much harsher way if you do a song produced by them.
